name: Labor of Love (Tyler Hodzen)
description:
Description:

A house is what you make of it. But a home is where the heart is. Entry for Global Game Jam January 2019.

Credits:

Wyatt Landers: Lead Programmer/Designer

Tyler Hodzen: Art & Animation/Programming

Micaela Pogue: Art

 Music: Dance of Strings by whitesand (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khZ6k5seqxI).

Assets not created by us: Made by Brackeys pulled from here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ryISV_nH8qw

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space: Chop down fully grown trees

Walk into the tent after you believe you have gathered enough materials.
